summary: This test module validates core utilities of the MODFLOW 6 package base, including functions for clipping time series data, handling repeated stress periods, and applying masks to both structured and unstructured grid inputs. It provides helper routines to construct expected datasets and runs a suite of assertions to ensure correct behavior across various scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of groundwater modeling package operations, thereby supporting reliable simulation outcomes for engineering and environmental analyses.
